section.title: Theme for the Release
section.p: The 0.9.19 release is primarily about finishing out and generalizing the map-based processing used in the EPUB, Kindle, HTML2, and HTML5 transforms.
I am also trying to get the vocabulary documentation finished out for this release.
It is also about HTML5 with the new HTML5 transformation type, developed by Bertrand Lefort.
The release also includes additions and refinements to the vocabulary, numerous bug fixes and whatnot.
See the Sourceforge project files area for release notes of the various release candidates.
